definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

sentences.english: A city of eastern Netherlands on the lower Rhine River east-southeast of Utrecht.
sentences.chinese: 荷兰东部城市，位于莱茵河下游乌得勒支东南偏东部。

sentences.english: Once over the Roer there was open, relatively flat ground between the Americans and the Rhine.
sentences.chinese: 一旦突破罗尔河，莱茵河与美军之间就是平原。

sentences.english: The River Rhine rises in Switzerland.
Location: North East of France, between the Vosges and the Rhine river.
sentences.chinese: 法国东南部，弗日山脉和莱茵河之间。

sentences.english: France borders Germany along parts of the Rhine.
sentences.chinese: 法国沿莱茵河部分河段与德国接壤。

sentences.english: The city of Koblenz was established at the confluence of the Rhine and Mosel.
sentences.chinese: 科布伦茨城建立在莱茵河和摩泽尔河的汇合处。

sentences.english: The windows in the second looked out over the plain along the Rhine.
sentences.chinese: 在第二间书房，举目望去，是莱茵河畔上的平原。

definition: Maas or Meuse River, Western Europe
Sava River, flowing through Southeast Europe
Ruhr River, a tributary of the Rhine in Germany
Po River, longest river in Italy

pinyin: Da2 da2 ni2 er3 Hai3 xia2
